alert.note: Alert for Beaver; Cimarron; Texas (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 01 at 12:33PM CST until January 02 at 9:00AM CST by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST THIS EVENING... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 9 AM CST SUNDAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Advisory, dangerously cold wind chills expected. For the Winter Weather Advisory, additional snow accumulations of a dusting to upwards near one inch in some locations. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...The Oklahoma Panhandle and the northern half of the Texas Panhandle. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Advisory, from 6 PM this evening to 9 AM CST Sunday. For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 6 PM CST this evening. * IMPACTS...Frostbite and hypothermia are possible if precautions are not taken. The cold wind chills could result in hypothermia if precautions are not taken. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Wind chills may drop down to around 15 below zero tonight.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Keep pets indoors as much as possible. Slow down and use caution while traveling. In Oklahoma, call 844-465-4997 for road information. In Texas, call 800-452-9292 for road information.
